front.title: Locator/ID Separation Protocol (LISP) Endpoint Identifier (EID) Block

abstract.t: This document directs IANA to allocate a /32 IPv6 prefix for use with the Locator/ID Separation Protocol (LISP). The prefix will be used for local intra-domain routing and global endpoint identification, by sites deploying LISP as Endpoint Identifier (EID) addressing space.
